modName: Mage Outfit Texture Overhaul (HD 2K)- MOTO - Gloves
summary: HD (2K) re-texture of Focusing gloves and Mage (regular brown) gloves.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia] [center][img]http://i1368.photobucket.com/albums/ag172/Daiyus37/Modding/Mod%20Page%20Description%20Banners/02.%20Description_zpsk0w9jguz.jpg[/img][/center]Drem Yol Lok, fellow mages, welcome to [i]Mage Outfit Texture Overhaul (HD 2K) - MOTO - Gloves[/i] by [i]Alexandriel[/i].
[font=Georgia]
This is High Definition[/font][font=Georgia] (2K)[/font][font=Georgia] re-texture of Focusing and Mage gloves.
Normalmaps are also 2K.

[color=#ff0000]SCREENSHOTS ARE HIGHLY APPRECIATED.[/color] These are not the best, do not have good PC to make better.
[/font]
This mod is addon to [i]Mage Outfit Texture Overhaul (HD 2K) - MOTO - With Schools of Magic [/i]by [i]Rafuel and Alexandriel[/i], that you can find here (click on the image below).[/font][center][font=Georgia][font=Georgia]
[img]http://i1368.photobucket.com/albums/ag172/Daiyus37/Modding/Mod%20Page%20Description%20Banners/07.%20Credits_zpsz3pv5juj.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5657210][/url][/font][/font][/center][font=Georgia][font=Georgia][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5657210]Rafuel[/url]. (I used textures from his work, and he used textures from someone's deviantart, idk)
Alexandriel.

Used tools:
Photoshop.[center]

[img]http://i1368.photobucket.com/albums/ag172/Daiyus37/Modding/Mod%20Page%20Description%20Banners/08.%20Permissions_zpsprqhohzd.jpg[/img]
[color=#ff0000][/color][/center][color=#ff0000]This mod is Nexus exclusive. DO NOT download those FILES on other sites. [/color]
[/font][center]
___________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=#ff0000][size=3][color=#ffffff]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69289/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/headers/69289.jpg[/img][/url][/color][/size][/color][/center][/font][center][font=Georgia]
Thank you.[/font][/center]
author: Alexandriel
